page.title: 08A RECTORS DAY
page.content:
{A DAY IN THE LIFE OF THE RECTOR OF { COATES - JULY 1985.}
6.30 am RISE AND SAY PRIVATE PRAYERS AND MATINS. 7.30 am REST OF HOUSE GETS UP AND WE BREAKFAST AND DO HOUSEHOLD CHORES UNTIL 9 am.SETTLE AT DESK TO DO CORRESPONDENCE, PHONE CALLS AND PLAN EVENTS FOR THE REST OF THE DAY. 10.00am IF NO OTHER ENGAGEMENT, VISITING. 12.30pm TO LUNCH AT THE ROYAL AGRICULTURAL COLLEGE WHERE I HAVE A'SURGERY' UNTIL 2pm. AFTERNOON OFF TO ATTEND TO PERSONAL AFFAIRS. 4.30 pm AM AT MY DESK FOR PHONE CALLS to PREPARATION FOR EVENING OR 5.30 pm VISITING.
